column4: Tesla CEO Musk says considering second U.S. plant  closer to East Coast
column5: DETROIT  Jan 13 Tesla Motors is planning to build factories in China and Europe and is considering a second U.S. plant  Chief Executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday.

column4: Tesla CEO says China sales weak  promises Model X by third quarter
column5: DETROIT Tesla Motors Inc  Chief Executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday that the electric luxury car maker's sales in China were "unexpectedly weak" during the fourth quarter  but sought to assure an audience in Detroit the problems are being fixed.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla CEO says China sales weak  promises Model X by 3rd qtr
column5: DETROIT  Jan 13 Tesla Motors Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday that the electric luxury car maker's sales in China were "unexpectedly weak" during the fourth quarter  but sought to assure an audience in Detroit the problems are being fixed.

column4: Tesla shares slump 7 pct on weak China sales
column5: Jan 13 Tesla Motors Inc shares slumped late on Tuesday after Chief Executive Elon Musk said the electric luxury car maker's sales in China were "unexpectedly weak" during the fourth quarter. But he assured an audience in Detroit the problems are being fixed.
